products.name: CYCLORAMA LIGHTS 1000W
products.description: The Cyclorama Lights 1000W Black is a high-performance lighting solution designed for professional stage and studio applications. Featuring a 1000W power output, this light ensures bright and even illumination, making it ideal for backdrop lighting. It operates at 240V and has an IP33 rating, providing reliable performance in controlled environments. The HF-1000 type design includes an aluminum anodized finish reflector, which enhances light distribution for optimal coverage. Equipped with two compressible recessed single-contact holders, it ensures secure lamp placement. With a sturdy build and a weight of 7.5 kg, this cyclorama light is both durable and efficient for professional use.

holder: 2 nos. compressible recessed Single contact App

Splitter unit is designed to cater for small as well as larger networks to have effective distribution of signal and amplifying the signal voltage to keep it uniform through all 8 outgoing ports.

products.description: Auto Sensing of supply voltage (140-260VAC). Automatic supply frequency tracking 45-60 HZ. Linear dimming curve. 'Neon'Load present' indicators. High Quality RF noise suppression. Single, Dual or three phase operation. Radio Frequency Interference suppression to better than BS-800 guidelines. 6 channels - 99.5% duty circle. 19" Rack Mounting - 4U Phase monitoring Neon. Control Signal monitoring LEDs. 6 Channel rack mounting DIMAT dimming pack with holding handles. 10-10 Volts control input by one 8-pin Din socket. Soft start function at power up. Lamp pre-heat level selector for longer lamp life. Individual channel test controls. Individual channel blown fuse indicators. Individual channel status indicators. Available model six-channels x2 (Tour series in fly pack) Having 18 Nos. 15 Amp. Multi Socket for using the direct points.

products.name: 12 CHANNEL WALL MOUNT DIMMER
products.description: A 12CH wall mount electronic dimmer is an electronic device used to control the brightness of 12 separate lights or light fixtures. It is mounted on a wall and operates by adjusting the voltage supplied to the light, effectively reducing its brightness. This type of dimmer is often used in residential or commercial settings to create mood lighting, conserve energy, and extend the life of light bulbs. It typically operates using a switch or slider, and may include additional features such as adjustable minimum brightness and smooth dimming. In addition to controlling the brightness of lights, 12CH wall mount electronic dimmers can also help reduce energy consumption. By adjusting the voltage supplied to the lights, the dimmer can reduce the amount of power used, which can result in lower electricity bills. Additionally, electronic dimmers can extend the life of light bulbs by reducing the amount of heat generated during operation, which can reduce the risk of bulb failure.

construction: Rugged construction ensures long life even under the most demanding conditions.

products.name: DMX CONTROLLER 384
products.description: DMX Controller 384. The DMX 384 controller is a DMX hardware controller for lighting effects that are compatible with DMX protocol. It will control up to 12 fixtures whit 32 DMX channels each (384 total channels). There are 30 banks with 240 total programmable scenes. The DMX 384 controller has 16 control faders with 2 page banks. With DMX 384 Controller, you can record up to 6 chases with separate fade times and step speeds. Product colour: Black. DMX connection: 3 pin XLR. Power supply: 220 - 240VAC 50Hz. Dimensions (L x W x H): 520 x 190 x 80mm. Weight (kg): 2.450.

products.name: 3 PHASE BOARD
products.description: 3 phase distribution boards are panels that house the circuit breakers, ground leakage protection units and fuses that are used to distribute power to individual consumer points or circuits within a building. They are generally used in larger industrial, public and commercial settings although can also be used within some domestic environments.

features.title: Type
features.text: Flight Case Distribution Box With CEE forms, Schuko Sockets, Indian sockets etc...

features.title: Special Features
features.text: Under/Over Voltage Protection, Neutral Failure Protection
